author: Renella, Pierangelo and Aboulhosn, Jamil and Lohan, Derek G and Jonnala, Praveen and Finn, J Paul and Satou, Gary M and Williams, Ryan J and Child, John S

title: Two-dimensional and Doppler echocardiography reliably predict severe pulmonary regurgitation as quantified by cardiac magnetic resonance
